memberdef.argsstring: (int dob_year, int dob_month, int dob_day, int dt_year, int dt_month, int dt_day)
memberdef.name: get_age_at_date

briefdescription.para: Calculate the age in (completed) months for a given birthday and the date of interest, returns -1 if not born yet at the given date.
Calculate the age in (completed) months for a given birthday and the date of interest, returns -1 if not born yet at the given date.

parameterdescription.para: Date at which to calculate the age
